Execelente expancion de Half Life, complementa muy bien ala historia, controlaremos al Cabo Adrian Sheppard el cual fue enviado a Silenciar a todos los testigos sobre tofo Gordon Freeman. Habra enemigos muy variados como Xenianos pero habran otros enemigos como la Raza X con aspecto diferentes a los aliens de Xen estos seran nuestro principales enemigos alienigenas, en cuanto enemigos humanos estaba vez los Comandos Negros (Que ya aparecieton en el juego original) los cuales fueron enviados a eliminar todo rasto de Black Mesa incluso a los militares. Contaremos con armamento muy variado, tendremos armas que ya aparecieron en el Half Life Original asi como otras nuevas y algunas reemplazadas. Al igual que Half Life G-Man no estara observando desde lugares inaccesibles a no ser que uses trucos xD. Lo unico malo es que este juego viene en ingles pero veces hablaran en español al nteractuar o en algun que otro dialogo en caso de tener instalado el Half Life. El Multijugador aun esta vivo pero con muy pocos servidores pero almenos es entretenido para distraerte de la historia. Recomiendo bastante esta expancion ya que ofrece mas contenido mas enemigos, mas armas y una duracion bastante buena eso si es mas corto que Half Life pero se perdona por las mejoras que trae
HALF LIFE VERDEEE

The most badass half life protagonist. Arguably as fun or maybe more than the original. More enemies, new weapons, a pretty sick end boss. 10 out of 10, would play again.
Es una gran entrega que desde otra perspectiva complementa muy bien la historia del primer juego. Lo recomiendo en su totalidad, es muy entretenido.
Classic

There will never be games/mods like this, at least in my eyes. A parallel look at what happens in Black Mesa and what characters/groups are thinking.

First off, to begin, they are plenty of new weapons to use in OF that I think are insanely fun. Blue Shift has an interesting story, but less weapons than HL and OF.

Secondly, the story is superior to that of BS. Although this is heavily opinion based to say, I believe the point of view from the military group is better than the point of view of a guard at Black Mesa.

However, for something less opinion based, here's some points I'll make:
-Servers are still active and include all these fun weapons
-Amazing ambient music and action-paced music
-Difficult but not crazily difficult (adds difficulty from HL and removes complexity from certain aspects like the whole Silo section vs. The Pit Worm chapter)
-Almost double the amount of sections than in Blue Shift, but slightly less than Half-Life

All in all, strongly recommend BUT I suggest owning the first Half-Life game before playing as it'll be insanely confusing.
its very fun and relaxing to play

공식 스토리는 아닌걸로 되어있지만 셰퍼드는 프리맨을 쫒는데 같은시간대에 다른일을 하고있는점에서 상당히 흥미로운 전개입니다. 

셰퍼드팀은 블랙메사의 전인원 사살을 듣지 못한채 추락해서 경비원과 과학자에게 도움을 주고 받기도하고 1에선 거이 없다싶었던 분대플레이도 좋았고 혼자서 전투하기 까다로울때마다 군인들이 나옵니다.

난이도는 보통기준으로 잡았는데 일단 fps를 잘 못하는 저로썬 블랙옵스가 후반부에는 상당히 많이 나와서 짜증날정도로 많이 나와서 힘들었습니다.  AI도 좋은편이라 수류탄을 플레이어의 시아각으로 던지지 않고 상당히 높게 던지고 수류탄을 바닥에 두고 도망가 유인하기고 합니다. 시벌..

흥미로운 젠 생물들이 도구, 무기가 되어서 재밌었습니다.

Opposing Force is the classic follow-up to Valve's Half-Life. Packed with familiar challenges and a host of new mutations and aliens it's the perfect shoot-em-up FPS with the same balance of storyline and gameplay as the original. Granted it will never be as fresh as Freeman's first tango with Xen and it's many minions, but it gives players the chance to return to Black Mesa from a different point of view, with more firepower. One of my personal favourites was always the reference to Full Metal Jacket in the training camp.
If you have played Half Life 1 this will spice things up a bit

This game is great for anyone who has just beaten the first game and is hungry for more. Even though this game might not look like something you would play for hours, its just as good as Half-Life 1. The only flaws I could think of is that the graphics haven't aged very well and neither has the AI. To me, the only thing that truly matters when playing a video game is that its fun and Half-Life Opposing Force is just that, fun.

Opposing Force expands the plot of Half-Life greatly and offers captivating gameplay set in a world of science fiction. The later levels, however, focus too much on action.

7.8/10

Great expansion to Half-Life, in this you play as Adrian Shephard and get to see the Black Mesa incident unfold from a different perspective. New interesting weapons and enemies, great music and some funny moments and little secrets here and there. Worth playing and a must for anyone who has enjoyed any other Half-Life title!!
Rest Adrian, you fought well soldier!
